channel.title: Comments on: 32nd Birthday Pictures From Work
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Thanks a lot.
When you have a birthday, someone might make one for you as well :)
item.content:encoded:
Thanks a lot.

When you have a birthday, someone might make one for you as well :)

item.title: By: udim
item.dc:creator: udim
item.description: Happy birthday! I was wondering what that aluminum foil ball with candles on your desk was.
item.content:encoded:
Happy birthday!
I was wondering what that aluminum foil ball with candles on your desk was.
